title: Aadhya's Floral Splendor: Gold and Gemstone Earrings
materials: 22K Gold. Set with high-quality Rubies (Carats: 3.0) and Emeralds (Carats: 2.5)
White Zirconia. Hyderabadi Polish applied for a lasting luster.
features: Floral design showcasing a beautiful arrangement of gemstones. Delicate gold filigree work (Jali work) surrounding each stone, creating an airy and intricate effect. Oval cut rubies and emeralds are arranged in a balanced manner with surrounding zircons. A central green gemstone adds focus.
occasions: and formal gatherings. Adds a touch of elegance to any outfit
making it perfect for both traditional and modern occasions.
description: These earrings are a harmonious blend of traditional design and modern aesthetics. The combination of rubies, emeralds, and gold creates a captivating visual appeal that is both timeless and elegant. Handcrafted by skilled artisans, these earrings are designed to be cherished for generations.
